TargetName: Provide repeatable harness validation scripts and docs suitable for local + CI validation gates
Statement: DEL-07-01 implements SOW-028 as its primary scope coverage item
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in decomposition Scope Ledger: SOW-028 maps to PKG-07 / DEL-07-01.

TargetName: Validation posture and governance/agent-suite conformance enable repeatable operation
Statement: DEL-07-01 supports OBJ-006 as its primary objective
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in decomposition: DEL-07-01 SupportsObjectives = OBJ-006. Note: recorded as second IMPLEMENTS_NODE because both SOW-028 and OBJ-006 are explicit definition anchors; see Run Notes for AMBIGUOUS_ANCHOR assessment.

TargetName: Target platform = macOS 15+ Apple Silicon only
Statement: Tests must target macOS 15+ Apple Silicon per platform decision
Notes: FACT. DEC-PLAT-001 confirmed in decomposition Decision Log.

TargetName: Outbound internet access permitted only for Anthropic API calls
Statement: Test infrastructure must respect Anthropic-only outbound network policy
Notes: FACT. DEC-NET-001 confirmed in decomposition Decision Log. Guidance C2 elaborates applicability to test infrastructure.

Notes: FACT. Procedure PR-04 explicitly names DEL-03-01 as prerequisite.

Statement: Harness runtime must be available for turn execution and SSE validation; DEL-03-02 provides turn execution API + SSE
EvidenceQuote: requires DEL-03-01 (session boot) and DEL-03-02 (turn execution) to be functional
Notes: FACT. Procedure PR-04 explicitly names DEL-03-02 as prerequisite.

Notes: FACT. Procedure PR-08 explicitly lists DEL-03-01 through DEL-03-06.

TargetName: Anthropic Provider Integration & Key Provisioning Contract

EvidenceQuote: Upstream deliverables DEL-03-01 through DEL-03-06 and DEL-04-01 provide the harness behaviors to validate

Statement: Validation suite may consume DEL-07-02 example execution roots as test fixtures for session boot tests
EvidenceQuote: DEL-07-02 maintains example execution roots... The validation suite may consume these examples as test fixtures
Notes: FACT. Guidance C6 explicitly names DEL-07-02. Confidence MEDIUM: relationship is stated as 'may consume' (conditional), not mandatory. Procedure Phase 1 Step 1.5 also references reviewing DEL-07-02 fixtures.

Statement: Harness contract reference document (Sections 9.7-9.8) required to define testable assertions
Notes: FACT. Procedure PR-07 explicitly requires SPEC accessibility. Specification REQ-01 through REQ-10 derive contract assertions from SPEC Sections 9.7-9.8.

Statement: K-invariants (K-SEAL-1 K-GHOST-1 K-INVENT-1 K-CONFLICT-1) provide binding invariants that tests should validate
EvidenceQuote: Tests SHOULD validate harness behaviors against CONTRACT.md binding invariants
Notes: FACT. Specification REQ-13 explicitly maps K-invariants to test behavioral areas. Datasheet R2 also references CONTRACT.md.

Statement: Changes to PKG-03 deliverables that modify harness API behavior should trigger review of affected tests in DEL-07-01
EvidenceQuote: Changes to PKG-03 (Runtime Core) deliverables that modify harness API behavior should trigger a review of affected tests in DEL-07-01
Notes: ASSUMPTION. Guidance C7 states co-evolution constraint. Confidence MEDIUM: this is a maintenance-lifecycle constraint rather than a hard prerequisite; however it is an explicit information-flow trigger (contract changes require test review).
